content: संदिह् {c2c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To smear, cover over, anoint. {@--2@} To heap together. {@--3@} To doubt, be uncertain about; <ls>Y. 2. 16</ls>; संदिग्धो विजयो युधि <ls>Pt. 3. 12.</ls> {@--4@} To mistake for, to confound with (in {%<ab>pass.</ab>%}); पांतु त्वामकठोरकेतकशिखासंदिग्धमुग्धेंदवः (जटाः) <ls>Māl. 1. 2</ls>; or धूपैर्जालविनिःसृतैर्वलभयः संदिग्धपारावताः <ls>V. 3. 2</ls>; <ls>Ku. 6. 40.</ls> {@--5@} To start an objection. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To confuse, perplex. {@--2@} To be doubtful or uncertain (<ab>Atm.</ab>).
